content: game is useless unless i'm somewhere with wifi cause if you try to play it offline it needs to be activated first waste of money for people that don't have data
replyContent:
Hello Larry!

Don't worry, the internet connection is needed only to activate the app in the first that you open it.
Once activated, you can play it offline.

If there is any problem with playing offline after having activated the app, please let us know at apps@mobi4hobby.com.

Best regards,
The Mobi4Hobby team

content: Guessing whoever made this is not a native English speaker

This way we can make the app better.

content: Works on multiple langage but cant change it and override system langage
replyContent:
Hello Pi!

We'll add this option in the future.
For now you can do this:

1. Clear app data (this will lose all your progress!)
2. Change the language in your phone
3. Open the app (this will make the app load in your phone's language)
4. Change the phone's language to the original again

More info: apps@mobi4hobby.com

Best regards
Mobi4Hobby team

content: Good ish if only used phones keyboard not in game one. Also be better if was randomised so could be better if use different devices.
replyContent:
Hello Matt!
Thank you for buying and rating!

Thank you also for the suggestions. The randomization is possible, but the device keyboard is much more challenging because in general it has more keys that aren't used in this app and occupies more space in the screen, and the user must not use the keyboard suggestions.

Keep safe!
The Mobi4Hobby team

content: Good not great. Spellings are American English so need to know those spellings. A lot of incorrect questions, for example substitutions are allowed in rugby but this game seems to think they're not allowed. A lot of questions related to US states and not much general knowledge questions.
replyContent:
Hello Adrian,

Thanks for rating and reporting!
We will try to fix that and make the app better for British English as well.
Please, reconsider your evaluation...

We wish you and your family a happy new year!

Best regards,
The Mobi4Hobby team
